reviews.comment: I have been a mystery shopper for about two years now and not only it is fun but it is easy money. Now with this app it will be even easier. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful application!
reviews.comment: This application is fun way for consumers to make money while providing valuable feedback to companies. If you need part-time job, install this app and work! Works great on my HTC desire HD. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have app
reviews.comment: Very useful info for mystery shopping beginners, as well experienced shoppers. You can earn good money, get free products, food and drink, and it\'s fun. A must have app, one of the few app that you will be using on a daily bases. This app should come preinstalled in every Android phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This app has every major mystery shopper company listed, so you can easily find one you signed up for or would like to.  Its a great way to sign in and rate shops on the go when you dont have a pen and paper or dont want to look like a mystery shopper!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a Great Opportunity!
reviews.comment: This application allows the user to complete mystery shops using an Android and a laptop. This is a fun way to generate some extra money. I would recommend this app to anyone who has a smart phone.
reviews.author: A Google User
